Program.Name: GiD classic renewed
Program.Description: GiD classic theme with some renewed icons
Program.NewsInVersion: * 0.8: gid 15 icons updated * 0.7: some more icons updated * 0.6: some more icons updated * 0.5: some more icons, updated to new preferences system * 0.4: updated some more icons * 0.3: updated some more icons and added size_64 icons (Super large) * 0.2: added clone and remoteFolder icons * First version: some renewed icons and different icons sizes: small (16 pixels), medium (24 pixels) and large (32 pixels)
